A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I was ready to enjoy the movie\, the next chapter of my favorite movies series.  Unfortunately\, a bad plot\, unlikable characters\, and poorly executed humor was delivered.  Honestly\, by the end of this mess\, I'm pulling for the bad guys.  I was hoping Mark Hamill was exaggerating with his description of the wasted opportunity.  He wasn't.  It's bad\, really really bad.
